column4: Hi I am a newbie to IRC, but I have a question I hope you can point me in the right direction.  How can I upgrade firefox to 1.5 on Ubuntu Breezy?  It is not available in Synaptic
if thats the case it means its not yet stable, and you probably shouldnt install it
I'd stay away from it, settle down with some tasty elinks
i didnt make fun of you, I gave you an answer based on the modicum of information you gave me, if you want to avoid prejudice then try harder.
